description:
x-go-binding: move gui/x11 out of the exp tree in the core library,
renaming it to ui/x11. Add an example program.

This is a straight copy-and-paste. A follow-up CL will convert ui/x11
to use xgb instead of custom code to speak the X11 protocol.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://x-go-binding.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/x-go-binding/source/detail?r=94464ef27b8b ***

x-go-binding: move gui/x11 out of the exp tree in the core library,
renaming it to ui/x11. Add an example program.

This is a straight copy-and-paste. A follow-up CL will convert ui/x11
to use xgb instead of custom code to speak the X11 protocol.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5405042
I've decided to change the package name from gui to ui, and am submitting.
